channel.title: ::Players Command
channel.description:
I was wondering how to change the ::Players command, instead of saying "Players Online 6"..or w/e It could open a menu telling the player name and level..like
Gdog284 Level 126 Pkerzdie2day Level 91 Nick Level 125
Oh and I would like to get rid of the "Players Nearby 1" from the screen
